name: Talent on Lease
description: TalentOnLease has access to a wide range of clients across the country who have urgent IT requirements for critical projects on a regular basis. TalentOnLease works with a wide range of partners (IT Services/Solution firms) to fulfil these requirements. All the IT partners we have on the platform have been on-boarded after careful verification and vetting. TalentOnLease is aimed at addressing the problem faced by the industry by bringing together Clients and Partners on a single platform to collaborate for mutual gains. The platform here acts as a responsible medium to not just provide means to transact for its tenants but also ensuring the trust building between them with the help of strong policy framework as well as strict audit mechanism.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Making available the Right Resources at the Right Time and at Right Cost
ShortDescription: TalentOnLease is a new age online platform backed by who’s who of IT industry, created by industry veterans with a single motto “Making available Right Resources at Right Time and at Right Cost”.
enhanced_description: TalentOnLease is a modern online platform designed to connect clients with urgent IT requirements for critical projects with a wide network of verified and vetted IT Services/Solution firms (partners). Launched in 2018 by industry veterans, the platform operates with the core motto of "Making available Right Resources at the Right Time and at Right Cost." It addresses the industry's challenge of efficient IT talent acquisition by serving as a responsible marketplace that facilitates transactions and builds trust through a robust policy framework and strict audit mechanisms. Key features include access to an active bench of over 6,190 IT professionals, ensuring all listed professionals are thoroughly verified and vetted, and enabling rapid talent deployment within 24 to 48 hours for critical project needs.
key_use_cases: Fulfilling urgent IT resource requirements for critical projects
Rapid IT staff augmentation and contract staffing
Streamlining the talent acquisition process for IT roles
Sourcing verified and vetted IT professionals efficiently
Ensuring quality and trust in IT talent engagements
competitive_advantages: Extensive active talent bench of over 6,190 IT professionals
Thorough verification and vetting process for IT professionals and partners
Centralized online platform connecting clients and IT partners
Strong policy framework and audit mechanism for trust building and governance
Focus on providing the 'Right Resources at the Right Time and at Right Cost'
implementation_scenarios: Cloud-based/SaaS platform for connecting clients and IT service/solution partners
Online marketplace for IT talent acquisition
roi_benefits: Faster time-to-hire for critical IT roles
Increased efficiency in talent acquisition processes
Reduced project delays due to rapid talent availability
Improved quality of hire through verified and vetted professionals
Cost optimization in IT resource procurement
Mitigation of hiring risks via robust policy and audit frameworks
primary_users: Clients requiring IT professionals for projects (e.g., IT departments, project managers, HR/Talent Acquisition teams)
IT Services/Solution Firms (Partners) providing IT professionals
